knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
#Install the tidyverse and palmerpenguins libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#Load the penguins dataset and check its structure
penguins_dataset <- penguins
dim(penguins_dataset)
```

2. The dataset is 344 rows by 8 columns.

```{r}
#Find the column (variable) names
names(penguins_dataset)
```

3. The variable names are species, island, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, sex, and year.

```{r}
table(penguins_dataset$island) # equivalent to summary(penguins_dataset$island)
```

4. Biscoe has 168 penguins, Dream has 124 penguins, and Torgersen has 52 penguins.

```{r}
mean(penguins_dataset$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```

The mean body weight is 4201.754 g.
